Desc.entry: Aims to bring together the community in Crookes to influence how services are delivered, to support and improve the social welfare and safety of people living in Crookes, improve the environment and contribute to economic regeneration in the area. Liaises with relevant agencies to bring about improvements to the area. Participates in organising local festivals and activities. Promotes volunteering in the community.

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
